Speaker: voice
Dialogue: In a time of great strife, a legendary interdimensional being known as Zordon, came to the city of Angel Grove to establish a vanguard in the never ending struggle against evil.  with the aid of his trusted assistant, Alpha 5, the noble master sought out six extraordinary teenagers and gave them the power to transform into an unstoppable fighting force.  In time of great need, the young heroes could now call upon colossal assault vehicles known as "Zords".  while the identity of the six remained a guarded secret, their courageous exploits soon became the stuff of Legend, earning them the title...  The Mighty Morphin Power Rangers.

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: Once we hit the target zone we've got fifteen seconds to make the drop.

Speaker: bulk
Dialogue: The Stealth Eagle is about to fly.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: Five seconds to the target zone!

Speaker: bulk
Dialogue: Be the eagle.  Be the eagle.

Speaker: skull
Dialogue: Be the swallow.  Be the swallow...

Speaker: fred
Dialogue: Hey dad, get with the program!

Speaker: fred
Dialogue: Awesome!   Ryan's Comet is passing over in two days!

Speaker: skull
Dialogue: Stealth Eagle, huh?  The Lame Duck is more like it!

Speaker: reporter
Dialogue: We're here at the World Center Construction Site, where a mysterious object was just uncovered in a freak accident in which one workman suffered minor injuries...

Speaker: reporter
Dialogue: ... Angel Grove Police have cordoned off the area until it can be determined whether or not the unidentified object poses any threat.  The injured workman was quoted as saying...

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: It's one smooth move and then you've gotta explode off the top.

Speaker: ernie
Dialogue: Hey, no Karate on the patio!

Speaker: ernie
Dialogue: So, what're the plans for the weekend?

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: Aisha and.I are checking out a new dance spot.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: I'll be at the Observatory Sunday.

Speaker: rocky
Dialogue: We should throw a little comet shindig.

Speaker: bulk
Dialogue: The earth was hurtling toward us at seven hundred miles per hour, and we knew at that moment that we were facing death straight in the eye.

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: Ay,  yi,  yi,  yi,  yi !  Our thermionic-sensors have been hit by a CATACLYSMIC surge of evil!

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: Rangers, you must act swiftly. The planet is in GRAVE danger!

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: Six thousand years ago a morphological being known as Ivan Ooze, ruled the world with a reign of unparalleled terror. Finally, a rebel factor known as the "Order of the Meledon" lured him into a hyperlock chamber and buried him deep underground.

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: In a place that came to be known as Angel Grove.

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: The chamber has been accidently UNCOVERED!  You must return it to the depths. or  anyone should open it and Ivan is released!

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: To assist you I have retro-fitted your helmets with new Opti-Scan devices.

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: Use extreme caution, Rangers. You are dealing with an evil here that is beyond ALL comprehension.

Speaker: rita
Dialogue: Another Saturday night and I'm traipsing around the galaxy with the THREE LITTLE PIGS!  My mother warned me this would happen! Rita, she said, after 89 marriages you might wanna think about throwing in the towel.  Why didn't I listen to her?!

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: No need to wake him.  In fact, why don't you take a little nap yourself.

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: Hey bonehead, get off my hoof!

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: After two thousand years of searching...  I have finally found you.

Speaker: goldar
Dialogue: Mordant's my second cousin three times removed on my mother's side.  He`s just visiting for the summer.

Speaker: rita
Dialogue: Well put a muzzle on him!

Speaker: rita
Dialogue: What... you spent two thousand years looking for this tub of SNOT!

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: Don't you ever have anything nice to say?!

Speaker: rita
Dialogue: Well, if I did I certainly wouldn't say it to you!

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: For your information this is not just your average, run-of-the- mill tub of snot !

Speaker: rita
Dialogue: You're trying to tell me there`re different levels of snot?!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Ladies and Gentlemen... the OOZE is back!!

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: I am Lord Zedd, sworn enemy of all that is good and decent.  It is a supreme honor to finally meet you.

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: How can I ever repay you?

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: Do you recall the name...  Zordon of Eltare?

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: I want you to destroy Zordon, so that my evil may once again reign SUPREME.

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: It's like a freeway.  How long have  you  been  locked  up? !

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: We shall leave you to weave your wicked ways.

Speaker: rita
Dialogue: Now we go out on the town.  First dinner, then dancing, then --

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: Remind me to have a word with Alpha about his teleporting calculations.

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: ... Let's take a look over there.

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: You haven't by any chance seen a ... morphological being lurking around?

Speaker: security guard
Dialogue: The only thing I've seen is you teenagers.  And you know... if there's one thing in the world I reeeeally hate....

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: You're too kind.  Allow me to introduce myself.  I am the infamous, world-reviled, universally despised, IVAN OOZE!

Speaker: rocky
Dialogue: Well, pack your bags cause we're sending you back where you came from!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Gee, a teenager with a big mouth. Not much has changed in six thousand years.

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: we're not just teenagers, raisin- head.

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: We're the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Power Rangers, huh?  So Zordon is still using a bunch of rug-rats to do his dirty work.  And speaking of rats...

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: From this moment forth, the world as you know it SHALL CEASE TO EXIST!

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: Alpha, my sensors tell me the Rangers were too late!  Ivan is on his way here!

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: Hey, NOBODY enters the Command Center without a power coin!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Gee... pretty fancy-shmancy.  I guess if you invest your money well over SIXTY centuries you can buy something pretty nice.

Speaker: alpha  5
Dialogue: Welcome to Wiener World.  May I take your order, please?

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: You haven't changed, Ooze. You're still picking on creatures smaller than yourself.

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Put a cork in it "Z" .  Ten minutes out of the egg and I'm already listening to one of your lectures.

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: It worked for six thousand years.

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Do you have any idea what it's like to be cooped up in a rotten egg for six thousand years?  It's BORING!  Not to mention I've had a Charlie horse since the Renaissance!  But now the tables are turned.  Now...

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Oh, the things that I have missed.  The BLACK PLAGUE!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: And now, finally, I have the strength to DESTROY your pathetic powers FOREVER!!

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: YOU WON'T GET AWAY WITH THIS!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: I've got a NEWS flash for you LIGHT-BRIGHT -- I ALREADY HAVE!

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: You put your left probe in, you put your left probe out, you put your left probe in and you shake it all about.  You do the hokey- pokey and you turn yourself around...

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: Let's teach these vermin a few manners.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: They're on the other side of that wall.

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: I'll GET you my pretty, and your little DOG toa!!

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: He must've blown an anitromic demodulator!

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: Outside of his time warp he's aging at a vastly acellerated rate!

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: We have to get you back inside your time warp.

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: I'm afraid that's impossible... The power has been destroyed. It's gone... The Zords, the weapons...  all of it.  The Mighty Morphin Power Rangers are no more.

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: Zordon... you can't leave us. Ever since you came into our lives... you've been like another father `to  us  all.-

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: ... You must be strong... Ivan almost overthrew the planet once...  and now I'm afraid he has the strength to see his scheme through.

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: I do not LIKE Green Eggs and Ham! I do not like them, Sam-I-am!

Speaker: adam
Dialogue: There has to be something we can do.

Speaker: aisha
Dialogue: Alpha.  Is there any way we can defeat this  monster?  Any way at all?

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: ... Perhaps there is a way... I have heard tales of another power.

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: ... They say that somewhere beyond the Hyperion Constellation there exists a mythological power that is beyond all comprehension.

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: How can we get to it?

Speaker: rocky
Dialogue: We have to try, Alpha.  It's our only hope.

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: It's far too dangerous.  Zordon would never allow it.

Speaker: aisha
Dialogue: If we don't try, Zordon won't survive!

Speaker: adam
Dialogue: If Ivan  Ooze  isn't  stopped, nobody will survive.

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: Ay, yi, yi, yi.  The legend speaks of a Master Warrior who lives on the planet Phaedos... This is the only person who knows the secrets of the power.

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: Zordon's going to have my orbicular spheroids when he hears out about this!

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: This is an emergency reserve of morphonic emissions.  It should be enough to get -you there.

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: There is one problem.  I only have enough reserve to send you Phaedos...  I can't bring you back.

Speaker: adam
Dialogue: So how do we get back?

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: ... You'll have to pray that the legends are true.

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: You're sure you want to do this?! The Rangers share purposeful looks.

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: Ay, yi, yi, yi.  They're DOOMED!!

Speaker: goldar
Dialogue: According to the TX Tracker, they're headed for Phaedos.

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: I'm gonna fire that slimeball so fast his not gonna know what hit him!

Speaker: rita
Dialogue: You garlic-sucking DINGLEBRAIN! The Rangers are going after the Great Power  He's nothing but a slime- infested, jelly-bellied blob of --

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: How dare you?!  Nobody shuts up Rita but me!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Sorry, slick, there's been a slight'change of plans.  The "booger man" is taking over.

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: Nobody double-crosses Lord Zedd and lives!

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: Zedd's gonna kick this snotball into next week!

Speaker: rita
Dialogue: This is all your fault!  If you'd taken me out tonight like you were suposed to, none of this would've happened.

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Now you have a choice, either serve me, or join those insufferable cheesedongs.

Speaker: goldar
Dialogue: We never liked the cheesedongs in the first place.

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: Couldn''t stand them -- low-class all the way.  And did you catch a whiff of their BREATH?!  It's like having a conversation with a couple of ONIONS!  Not to mention...

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Tengu Warriors, you will fly to Phaedos, find the Power Rangers...  and TEAR THEM APART!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Mordant, go with them and report back to me!

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: You know boss, I'd really like to help out but I've got this gastronomic condition which rules out all space trave--

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: Isn't this just TYPICAL!  We finally do somebody a good turn and just look what happens!

Speaker: rita
Dialogue: From now on it's E-V-I-L, NO exceptions!

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: Ay, yi, yi, yi!  The filamentary transistors have malfunctioned!

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: This puddle thing is really getting on my nerves.

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: Let's see if we can find this Master warrior.

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Taking over the world is one thing.  It's finding good help to run it for you that's the killer.

Speaker: goldar
Dialogue: You want me to place a few calls?

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: No need.   I'm going to use the young minds of Angel Grove.

Speaker: goldar
Dialogue: No offense, boss, but they might find you a little disgusting.

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Yes, well, I suppose you'd know a little something about that.  Not to worry.  I'll ever so gently lure them in and mold them into an army of devils!  And what better way to entice them ... than with a little Ivan's Ooze?!

Speaker: goldar
Dialogue: But boss, what about their parents?

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Ah, the old and doddering.  I'm going to SCOURGE their puny minds, reducing them to ZOMBIE'S. And then I'll put them to work rebuilding my empire.

Speaker: skull
Dialogue: I understand you're looking for a few new assistants.

Speaker: bulk
Dialogue: Well put your mind to rest `cause now you've got the best.

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: What is this?!  I advertised for brilliant and good looking assistants!

Speaker: skull
Dialogue: Bulk... why don't we give Mr. Peep here a chance to think it over?

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: I was just thinking about Zordon...  everything we've been through together.

Speaker: aisha
Dialogue: You know, meeting Zordon... teaming up with you guys, it's the best thing that's ever happened to me.

Speaker: rocky
Dialogue: It's the best thing that's ever happened to all of us.

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: We'll get this warrior...  save Zordon...  and send that SLIMEBALL Ivan Ooze back to the SEWER he crawled out of.

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: What's the matter with you woodpeckers!  Take this guy out!

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: The Tengu Warriors my butt!  The Tengu TURKEYS is more like it!

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: Hey, aren't you bird-brains forgetting something?!

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: Wow!  That was amazing for such a little dude!

Speaker: figure
Dialogue: You're trespassing.  Now state your business.

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: We're looking for the Master Warrior.  Do you know where we can find him?

Speaker: figure
Dialogue: The Master Warrior doesn't entertain visitors  -

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: But we have to find him.  Our leader Zordon is dying.

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: The lady asked you a question.

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: Huh ... Oh, uh, we re, ah...

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: He was attacked by this horrific being -- Ivan Ooze.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: Ivan Ooze is free?!  We are all in mortal danger!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Boys and girls, girls and boys, gather round and feast your eyes. This ain't sludge and this ain't guck... this is the one and only Ivan's Ooze!  Yesireebob.  It's ooey, gooey and even kind of chewy.  But best of all it's FREE!

Speaker: fred
Dialogue: So where'd this guy come from?

Speaker: skull
Dialogue: Uh... that's classified, top secret, confidential, undercover information.

Speaker: bulk
Dialogue: If we told you -- we'd have to kill you.

Speaker: wizard
Dialogue: Come on, come all -- it's an COZE FREE FOR ALL!

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: Mine seems to be a little undercooked.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: Add a few dried weevils and you'll never know the difference.

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: Listen, we appreciate your hospitality, but we really don't have much time.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: What do you know of the Great Power?

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: Only that we need it to defeat Ivan Ooze.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: It is said that to those who possess the Power... all things are possible.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: In another time, another dimension.  It was brought here long ago by the "Nathadians", a people who are now all but extinct. They built an impenetrable stone Monolith to store the power and keep it from their enemies.  For thousands of years, beings from all over the Universe have tried to obtain it... ALL have perished.

Speaker: aisha
Dialogue: So how can we get to it?

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: The only way to obtain the power is to achieve the highest state of being...

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: And how do we do that?

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: By learning the ancient art of Ninjetti.  It is the Genesis of what you on earth have come to know as the Ninja.  It is the perfect union of mind, body and spirit.

Speaker: rocky
Dialogue: Look, Zordon doesn't have much longer to live.  And for all we know, Angel Grove could already be under attack.  We don't have TIME for this.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: You don't understand.  If you do not have the Ninjetti, the power will destroy  you.  To reach the Monolith we must traverse the Neola jungle.  We will train today, and set out on foot tomorrow.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: He wants to know if you'd like a cube of sugar in your tea.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: In the language of the Nathadians, "Nin" stands for "man", "jetti" stands for "animal".  Ninjetti  - man and animal, together as one.  Now, put your hands inside the flame.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: Now tell me... what do you see?

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: Aisha, you are the Bear, stalwart and bold.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: Rocky, you are the Mighty Ape.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: Close.  Billy, you are the Wolf, cunning and swift.

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: I think its some kind of bird.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: Kimberly, you are the Crane, agile and sublime.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: Adam, you are the Frog, quick as lightning.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: Tommy, you are the Falcon, Winged Lord of the Sky.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: I... am the sole living descendant of the "Nathadians".  Now prepare yourselves for the most intense physical and mental training known to man and animal.

Speaker: fred
Dialogue: I can't find my dad either.

Speaker: fred
Dialogue: That guy was the student body President

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: The crane maintains it's agility through the perfect harmony of mind, body and spirit.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: Snoggle, we don't have time for you to show off

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: The ape is strong, but more importantly it is flexible and free.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: The wolf relies on it's enhanced senses to guide it...  He can hear what we cannot hear, he can smell what we cannot smell.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: The frog remains still and silent while it assesses its target... then strikes out in the blink of an eye.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: The bear is sturdy as a towering tree.  Nothing can uproot it.

Speaker: aisha
Dialogue: Girl, you've got to be kidding me.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: The falcon never struggles with the air, but rather becomes one with it.

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: You can do this.  You can do this.  You can do this...

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: ... Alpha, I am deeply concerned about the Rangers...

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: I told them it was too dangerous, but they wouldn't listen.

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: ... We must try to communicate with them.

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: Perhaps if I could locate a vertical-deflector then I could assemble a holographic-comlink.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: Each of you must reach deep within and draw upon your natural instincts...  Only then will you know the way of the Ninjetti.  Rest for a few hours.  We will continue at daybreak.

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: So where are we supposed to sleep?

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: That guy's cruisin' for a bruisin'.

Speaker: aisha
Dialogue: I've never been this sore in my life.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: Do you guys really think we can pull this off?

Speaker: adam
Dialogue: Maybe if we had more time.

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Ladies and gentlemen, Simon says...  STOP!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Simon says... stand on one foot!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: This is the Iast time I use parents for anything!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Let's pick it up here!  I've got a schedule to keep.  In twenty four hours the ooze is gonna hit the fan!

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: What kind of landing was that?! These clowns are a menace to the sky

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: Oh, it couldn't've gone better. The Power Rangers didn't know what hit them .

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: That's right.  And then we threw one of them off a mountain and another one into a raqing river!

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: Well... we were about to finish them off... when this huge monster came out of nowhere!

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: Okay, maybe he wasn't so huge. But you should've seen the size of his STICKS

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Did these sticks make a whistling sound?

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Dulcea!  That miserable, manipulating loathsome she-devil of a WITCH!!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: How could you let them get away?! If Dulcea leads them to the Great Power, everything will be ruined! They must be OBLITERATED!

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: What're you talking about?!  It wasn't my fault!  You're the featherbrains that let them get away!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: I call upon the Powers of Darkness to enrich the evil of my creatures by tenfold!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: And now the coup de grace, to lead my tribe to victorious battle!

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: Where does he come up with this stuff?

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Queen Tengu, lead-your warriors to Phaedos, FEAST YOURSELVES UPON THE POWER RANGERS AND BRING ME DULCEA!

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: You have been visited by the animal spirits... they have given you their blessing.

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Thank you!  Please!  You're too kind.  Finally. a little appreciation where it's deserved.

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Right back at ya!-  Now, WHO MISSES SCHOOL?!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: AND WHO WANTS TO JOIN ME IN RAISING HELL ACROSS  THE UNIVERSE?!

Speaker: fred
Dialogue: Can I have a word with you guys?  What's really going on here?! Where are everybody's parents?

Speaker: skull
Dialogue: Like we said before, that's classified, top secret...

Speaker: fred
Dialogue: Look, Ivan wants me to go dump a load of garbage all over them.

Speaker: bulk
Dialogue: Well, why didn't you say so?!

Speaker: skull
Dialogue: They're at the World Center Construction Site.

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: Dulcea... how do you and Zordon know each other?

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: We belonged to an interstellar Peace Keeping Force known as the "Order of the Meledan".  Zordon was widely regarded as the finest Commander in the Galaxy. He was a true Legend... If it wasn't for him, the Universe would be a very different place from what it is today.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: Over time our enemies were defeated...  I returned to Phaedos, Zordon moved on to continue the struggle elsewhere.  Until you kids showed up, I hadn't heard from him for centuries.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: This is why I'm taking you to the Nathadian Monolith.  That is why I'm teaching you the Ninjetti.  If Zordon dies... then a piece of all of us dies... and the force of good within the Universe will be dealt an irreparable blow.

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: As soon as we've taken over the world I'm gonna change my name to Sir Mordant.  Or how about MAJOR Mordant?!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: How about the two of you shut Up and pay attention!!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Feast your eyes upon the exoskeleton of the barbaric HORNITOR!  ONCE I HAVE MY ECTO-MORPHICON MACHINES UP AND RUNNING, I SHALL ANNIHILATE ANGEL GROVE... AND THEN... THE WORLD

Speaker: fred
Dialogue: We have to get out of here!

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: By bouncing ultra-high frequencies off one of the network satellites, I can send a long-range pulsar signal to within TWO FEET of the Rangers coordinates.

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: ... I just pray we're not too late.

Speaker: reporter
Dialogue: Angel Grove Police have been fielding hundreds of calls from concerned citizens as the number of missing gersons continues to grow

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Are you bored with your work? Are you bored with your family Are you bored with your 1ife Well, come on down to Ooze City and LET'S GET STICKY!

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: The Monolith is there in the distance.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: This is as far as I can take you.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: I have taught you all that I know.   Now you must achieve the Ninjetti on your own.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: It is said that once you've reached the power... you have only ten triacs to release it.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: About twenty seconds in your time.

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: And how do we release the power?

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: The legend goes that you release the power with the power.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: That is a question that even I cannot answer.  Remember, ten triacs.  After that something bad will happen.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: They say the power will throw off a super-heated, radioactive fireball, instantly reducing you to ash and bits of charred bone.

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: Ka'Alabas tor nartu En'Kata-Tay.  May your animals watch over you.

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Finally, after centuries of waiting, my Ecto-Morphicon machines are ready to take on the world!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: GET THAT THING OUT OF MY FACE!

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: Oh, man, that was a rental!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: Looks like a fine day for raising HELL!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: YOU HAVE SERVED YOUR PURPOSE. NOW YOU WILL RETURN TO THE CONSTRUCTION SITE AND LEAP TO YOUR DEMISE!

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: Man, these are the last guys I wanted to see.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: That's the only way to the Monolith...

Speaker: adam
Dialogue: The frog silently assesses its target, then strikes out...

Speaker: adam
Dialogue: ... in the blink of an eye.

Speaker: aisha
Dialogue: The bear is sturdy as a towering tree.  Nothing can uproot it.

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: ANGEL GROVE... I'D LIKE TO INTRODUCE YOU TO A COUPLE OF MY NEAREST AND DEAREST FRIENDS... HORNITOR!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: And his trimetallic partner in crime... SCORPITRON!!

Speaker: ivan
Dialogue: THE BOYS ARE BACK IN TOWN!!!

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: That should do it.  we won't be able to hear them, but they SHOULD be able to hear us.  Here goes.

Speaker: news reporter
Dialogue: ... the Mayor has declared a state of emergency and asked that the city be immediately evacuated.  He has reiterated the need for everyone to remain calm.

Speaker: news reporter
Dialogue: Angel Grove has never before known such a crisis and we can now only pray for the swift arrival of the Power Rangers!

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: I guess these guys weren't so lucky.

Speaker: aisha
Dialogue: We've come all this way for a rock wall?!

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: There should be a way to open it.

Speaker: rocky
Dialogue: Release the power with the power.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: ... There has to be something we're missing.

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: Rangers... Ivan has invaded the city... time is running out...

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: Each of you are now in possession of miraculous skills... but only when the six become one will you have the strength to harness the Great Power.

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: Six become one... the combined forces of the Ninjetti.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: I am the wolf, cunning and swift!

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: I am the crane, agile and sublime!

Speaker: aisha
Dialogue: I am the bear, stalwart and bold!

Speaker: adam
Dialogue: I am the frog, quick as lightning!

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: And I am the Falcon, Winged Lord of the Sky!

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: Of course!  The power is of another world.  Another dimension.

Speaker: kimberly
Dialogue: WE'VE GOT TEN TRIACS BEFORE WE'RE TOAST!!

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: Release the power WITH the power.

Speaker: aisha
Dialogue: Release the power with the power.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: I've got it!  We use the mirrors to reflect the light back into itself!!

Speaker: dulcea
Dialogue: Yes, Snoggle... they now have the Great Power of the Ninjetti!

Speaker: fred
Dialogue: You've been brainwashed!  This Ivan is no Wizard.  He's some kind of DEMON!

Speaker: fred
Dialogue: You gotta believe me -- he's EVIL!

Speaker: fred
Dialogue: Listen to me!  Our parents are in danger!  If we don't help them they're going to be killed!

Speaker: bulk
Dialogue: We could take it with us.

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: Rangers...  I'm afraid you're too late.

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: "To those who possess the Great Power...   all things are possible."

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: It's good to see you again, too.

Speaker: alpha  5
Dialogue: AI, YI, YI, YI, YI   Ivan s Ecto- Morphicon machines are leveling the city!

Speaker: rocky
Dialogue: We've got news for you, Ivan...

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: The Power Rangers are BACK IN BUSINESS!!

Speaker: skull
Dialogue: Look, kid, I don't think you realize who you're dealing with.

Speaker: fred
Dialogue: I don't think he realizes who HE'S dealing with.

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: GO, Rangers!  GO, Rangers!  GO, Rangers!  GO!

Speaker: goldar
Dialogue: SECOND COUSIN, THREE TIMES REMOVED.  NOW  GET OFF ME!

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: The monorail is in trouble! I'm going in!

Speaker: skull
Dialogue: That's gotta be an eighty foot drop!

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: Everybody hold on tight.  We're gonna send this sucker into OBLIVION!

Speaker: rita
Dialogue: You call yourself a hell-hound?! A basset hound is more like it. If you were a real outlaw you would've gotten me out of this blizzard HOURS ago!

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: This is the last time I marry a witch.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: Wait a second...  What time is it?

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: It's passing over earth as we speak!  Trajectory coordinates are

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: We get Ivan into the Comets PATH--

Speaker: rita
Dialogue: I hope those Rangers put that lousy lowlife out of his misery!

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: THREE DEGREES OFF THE COMETS TRAJECTORY!

Speaker: alpha 5
Dialogue: Ay, yi, yi!  The Rangers are going to be CRUSHED!

Speaker: tommy
Dialogue: WE HAVE TO GET OUT OF HERE!!

Speaker: aisha
Dialogue: Desperate times call for desperate measures.

Speaker: rita
Dialogue: We couldn't have done it better ourselves.

Speaker: zordon
Dialogue: Rangers, by going after the Great Power, all of you knowingly put your lives at extreme risk... and in so doing you not only saved my life, you saved all of Angel Grove and the world from a reign of unthinkable terror.

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: It's not what you DID, it's what you DIDN'T do!

Speaker: mordant
Dialogue: We tried to rescue you every chance we had!

Speaker: rita
Dialogue: Do you know what it's like to be stuck in a BLIZZARD FOR TWO DAYS?!

Speaker: zedd
Dialogue: Are you trying to be funny?!
